newsitem.title: UK: European raw cotton demand remains selective.
newsitem.headline: European raw cotton demand remains selective.

text.p: Mill demand for raw cotton remained selective on most European markets, industry sources said on Monday.
Spinners appeared unconvinced of any real threat to the continuity of supply over the coming months and were content to defer forward purchases in the hope of a downturn in the market.
However, unhelpful harvest-time weather recently in several important producing countries brought a degree of caution among prospective sellers.
The volume of new business concluded was small.
